p: There was a dengue outbreak happened in 2018, with totally 27 indigenous cases confirmed by PCR method. The index case was reported on 11 August, 2018. Cases increased gradually and reached a peak on 19 August. As an integrated control intervention was implemented focusing on case isolation, adult and larva mosquito control, the incidence decreased accordingly. The last reported case was on 8 September, 2018. The total attack rate (TAR) of the outbreak was 0.49% ( Fig 3).
